basic.description: The fundamentals of statistical mechanics with applications to thermodynamic properties of gases, liquids and solids and to chemical equilibrium in dilute gases. Offered alternating years with ENCH 413 (CHEM 413).
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Statistical Mechanics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prereq: ENCH 346 or CHEM 346 and registered in BSCE
Exclusion: CHEM 435
